summary: The Veterans Border Patrol Training Act proposes a pilot program within the Department of Homeland Security to train and hire transitioning service members as Border Patrol agents, using the Department of Defense SkillBridge Program. The program, developed in collaboration with the Secretaries of Defense and Veterans Affairs, aims to facilitate the transition of military personnel to civilian law enforcement careers. Annual reports to relevant congressional committees detailing program participation and demographics are mandated. The pilot program will end five years after its establishment.
